mapper.insert: INSERT INTO resource (user_name, namespace_name, resource_name, thrift_server_node_port) VALUES (#{userName}, #{namespaceName}, #{resourceName}, #{thriftServerNodePort});
mapper.update: UPDATE resource set user_name = #{userName}, namespace_name = #{namespaceName}, resource_name = #{resourceName}, thrift_server_node_port = #{thriftServerNodePort} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM resource WHERE user_name = #{userName} AND resource_name = #{resourceName};
